snippet: Mitt Romney joked about dismissing people as he comes under scrutiny for job losses connected to his time at a private equity firm.
abstract: Mitt Romney joked about dismissing people as he comes under scrutiny for job losses connected to his time at a private equity firm.
lead_paragraph: 12:27 p.m. | Updated NASHUA, N.H. - Mitt Romney began an address to the Nashua Chamber of Commerce here on Monday by talking about how he started his consulting career "at the entry level," and wound down his speech talking about the need to be "able to fire" people or businesses when they provide bad service.

headline.main: Romney Firing Remarks Draw Criticism From Huntsman
